jobDescription: Involves providing technical assistance for computer systems, diagnosing and resolving hardware and software issues, troubleshooting network problems, ensuring system security, and documenting procedures.
jobActivities: Identify and resolve hardware and software issues.
Address network problems to ensure uninterrupted connectivity.
Assist in managing VPN accounts using Fortinet, including tasks such as account creation, updates, and deletions.

jobDescription: I led a capstone team of 24 members through the entire capstone project lifecycle, from initial ideation to development. Over nearly a year, I was responsible for full-stack development, handling both front-end and back-end tasks.
jobActivities: Integrated third-party APIs and services as needed.
Full-stack development, encompassing both front-end and back-end functionalities.
Designed and implemented scalable and efficient solutions.
Documented project processes, code, and architecture for future reference.
